hotelapp

Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelapp.Hotel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Hotel>

    public class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Hotel>
    A class that represents a hotel. Stores hotelId, name, address, and averageRating.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(Hotel o)
      Compare hotels based on the name (alphabetically).

      Return the details fo hotel: name, address, city, state, latitude, longitude.
      java.lang.String getHotelId()

      Return the hotel name of this hotel.
      void setAverageRating(double averageRating)
      Set the averageRating of this hotel.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the string representation of the hotel in the following format: hotelName: hotelID streetAddress city, state Example: Travelodge Central San Francisco: 40682 1707 Market St San Francisco, CA Does not include information about the reviews.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Hotel o)
        Compare hotels based on the name (alphabetically). May use compareTo method in class String. If the names are the same, compare based on the hotel ids.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Hotel>

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the string representation of the hotel in the following format: hotelName: hotelID streetAddress city, state Example: Travelodge Central San Francisco: 40682 1707 Market St San Francisco, CA Does not include information about the reviews.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String
